description: The _translate_floating_ip_view method needs to pass fixed_ip ids to the floating ip dict if a floating ip is associated with a fixed ip. Also should assign fixed ips differenly.
title: Floating IPs API extension mapper method needs refactoring

comments.content: The _translate_floating_ip_view method needs to pass fixed_ip ids to the floating ip dict if a floating ip is associated with a fixed ip. Also should assign fixed ips differenly.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jakedahn
